original_text: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
korean_text: 그가 내 영광을 나타내리니 내 것을 가지고 너희에게 알리시겠음이라

sentences.original_text: for he shall receive of mine
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 내 것을 받을 것이기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and shall shew it unto you
